attributes.action: Hold a vote of (no) confidence in the Speaker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon the Prime Minister to offer the Commons a free vote on a 'no-confidence' motion in the Speaker, Michael Martin MP due to his egregious failure on the issue of expenses, both his own and the House in general.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
